ComicInfo.Title: Pittsburgh Noir, Part 3; Zombie-Proof- Zombie Zoo "The World That Is"
ComicInfo.Summary: The concluding chapter of the first Vampire, PA mini-series finds Dean desperate to track down the vampires who grabbed Dee-Dee, and he’s not about to let their minions stand in his way. It’s an all-or-nothing series of battles across Dormont with one life and many un-lives hanging in the balance. Also in this issue: two more chapters of Zombie-Proof: Zombie Zoo, leading into the upcoming Zombie-Proof one-shot! 30 pages of story and art.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-15 23:23:54. [CVDB245050]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Brendon Fraim, Brian Fraim, Brendon Fraim
ComicInfo.Inker: Brendon Fraim, Brian Fraim, Brendon Fraim
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: Brendon Fraim (artist), J C Vaughn (writer), Jacob Jordan Vampire, PA, 4742cf1b4c333e2fb9bac61c4040a14d Anna’s Archive
